title: Xmas Shortage Stories Are BS, Hell Is Bossware 12.09.21
itunes:title: Xmas Shortage Stories Are BS, Hell Is Bossware 12.09.21
description:
In episode 1046, Jack and Miles are joined by podcaster and comedian Jackie Kashian to discuss Mouse Movers: How workers are fighting back against BOSSWARE, Patriot Front? Huh? What? Never heard of them!, News of Christmas Shortages Continues to be Bullshit and more!

  1. Mouse Movers: How workers are fighting back against BOSSWARE
  2. Patriot Front? Huh? What? Never heard of them!
  3. Trumpsters blame Biden for Santa shortage in latest GOP 'Forever War on Christmas'
  4. News of Christmas Shortages Continues to be Bullshit
  5. Biden says 'America is back' as multiple crises intensify and Christmas tree shortage looms: Bruce
  6. BLAME THE SUPPLY CHAIN FOR LACK OF CHRISTMAS TREES


The Dork Forest with Jackie Kashian

The Jackie and Laurie Show

Listen: Stay Kashian

jackiekashian.com

LISTEN: Oil Slick by Puma Blue

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
